headline: Winter Storm Fern is Gathering Force. Businesses Are Bracing For Its Impact.
summary: Winter Storm Fern is forecast to bring heavy snow and ice across a large portion of the country through Monday, with airlines canceling flights and retailers rushing to keep shelves stocked.

headline: Walmart’s Premium Music Push and Nasdaq Move Could Be A Game Changer For Walmart (WMT)
summary: In recent days, Walmart Marketplace launched a Premium Musical Instrument Shop featuring professional-grade gear from brands like Fender, Roland, Boss and Zildjian, while Walmart also joined the Nasdaq-100 Index after transferring its stock listing to Nasdaq. Together, these moves highlight Walmart’s push into higher-value specialty categories and its positioning as a more technology-focused retail platform in the eyes of investors.
